conbody.p: Harvest crafting is an advanced type of crafting and provides options for a better control over the outcome.

It becomes available after clearing the harvest plots in the Sacred Grove - a random encounter area that can be found on maps. After a player enters the Sacred Grove, and finishes the small side quest there, they unlock the Horticrafting Station in their hideout.
Horticrafting station requires a currency called Lifeforce which is dropped only by the monsters in the Sacred Grove.
